pullRequest.title: Ek revise builds
pullRequest.bodyText:
These changes took the final artifact locally from 104,297,373 bytes to 93,581,496 bytes, saving >10M.
I think maintaining versions in one file is much preferred, especially when dealing with dependencies that share related versions (blackduck-common, integration-rest, integration-common, int-jira-common).

nodes.bodyText: I was not familiar with this until now. I like it.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@
+plugins {
+    id 'java-platform'
+}
+
+dependencies {
+    constraints {
+        api 'com.github.springtestdbunit:spring-test-dbunit:1.3.0'
+        api 'org.testcontainers:postgresql:1.12.5'
+        api 'org.apache.activemq:activemq-broker:5.15.10'
+
+        api 'org.jsoup:jsoup:1.9.2'
+        api 'com.jayway.jsonpath:json-path:2.3.0'
+        api 'com.sun.mail:javax.mail:1.6.2'
+        api 'javax.mail:javax.mail-api:1.6.2'
+
+        api 'org.postgresql:postgresql:42.2.8'
+        api 'org.liquibase:liquibase-core:3.8.9'

nodes.bodyText:
Would you be willing to test if this can be a runtime dependency rather api?

Start Alert
Navigate to the "About Page" (the page you are redirected to by default upon login)
Click on the link to API Documentation
See if it still works

nodes.bodyText: I didn't see this in the platform project explicitly declared.  Is this a transitive of another API dependency?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,9 +1,13 @@
 ext.moduleName = 'com.synopsys.integration.azure.boards.common'
 
 dependencies {
-    implementation 'com.google.cloud:libraries-bom:2.2.0'
-    api 'com.google.oauth-client:google-oauth-client'
-    api 'com.google.api-client:google-api-client:1.30.9'
-    api 'com.google.http-client:google-http-client-apache-v2:1.36.0'
-    implementation 'com.synopsys.integration:integration-common:22.2.0'
+    implementation platform(project(':alert-platform'))
+
+    implementation 'com.google.cloud:libraries-bom'
+    implementation 'com.google.oauth-client:google-oauth-client'

nodes.bodyText: This doesn't seem to have an explicit version declared in alert-platform.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -20,18 +20,30 @@ ext {
 apply plugin: com.bmuschko.gradle.docker.DockerRemoteApiPlugin
 
 dependencies {
-    runtimeOnly 'org.postgresql:postgresql:42.2.8'
-    runtimeOnly 'org.liquibase:liquibase-core:3.8.9'
+    implementation platform(project(':alert-platform'))
+
+    implementation 'com.synopsys.integration:blackduck-common', rootProject.ext.blackduckCommonExcludes
+    implementation 'org.springframework.data:spring-data-jpa'
+    implementation 'jakarta.persistence:jakarta.persistence-api'
+    implementation 'com.zaxxer:HikariCP'
+    implementation 'org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-autoconfigure'
+    implementation 'org.springframework.security:spring-security-core'
+    implementation 'org.hibernate:hibernate-core'
+
+    runtimeOnly 'org.postgresql:postgresql'
+    runtimeOnly 'org.liquibase:liquibase-core'
 
     // Connection Pool
     // https://www.baeldung.com/hibernate-c3p0
     // https://www.codejava.net/frameworks/hibernate/solved-jdbcconnectionexception-unable-to-acquire-jdbc-connection-with-hibernate-and-mysql
-    runtimeClasspath 'org.hibernate:hibernate-c3p0:5.4.2.Final'
+    runtimeClasspath 'org.hibernate:hibernate-c3p0'

commit.message: build: Add dependencies for missing libraries to run server.

nodes.bodyText: Can this comment be removed now?
